EmailTemplate.name: New Address Relo Started
EmailTemplate.subject: {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Relocation__c} Relocation Initiated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Relocation__c} relocation request to relocate Freestyle dispenser(s) has been initiated. Please take appropriate action to linkage and relocation execution procedures are adhered to.
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
